TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1643
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to J. C. Peyton, 05-23-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with J. C. Peyton, May 23, 1827. Commerce.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1643

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with J. C. Peyton, May 23, 1827. Commerce.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felepe de Austin */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-23-1827">May 23nd 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col S. F. Austin Dr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To Ferry for the year *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826*/date_mentioned*__________________________________$50. 6 1/4*/p*
*p*To 1 load wood 75 cts 2 pr Socks £1.50 pr_______________________ 3. 75*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-29-1827">29th Janry*/date_mentioned* 4 1/2 lbs bullets—37 1/2—-pr__________________________ 1.68 3/4*/p*
*p*1 Pile_______________________________________________ .50*/p*
*p*8 lbs sugar by *person_mentioned*Mrs. Picket_*/person_mentioned*______________________________ 2.00*/p*
*p*$58. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-25-1827">25 Apl*/date_mentioned*. 50 cts on Battle Brandy-------------------------------------------- . 50*/p*
*p*Amt bringing 3 Bushels meal from *person_mentioned*Groces */person_mentioned*25c. per bushel—_________ . 75*/p*
*p*$59.35*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="05-24-1827">May 24th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recd paymt. *person_mentioned*J. C. Peyton*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
